reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great quiet location in February, very clean and excellent choices in the dining room only had to wait a few mins to be shown to a table on a couple of occasions all staff very helpful.
reviews.title: Excellent All Inclusive

reviews.text: Drinks at the bar were fine again only had minor waits for service during the evenings, the piano player in the evenings was very good, the main entertainment in the larger bar upstairs was ok, usual type you would expect and all enjoyable.
reviews.title: Perfect break for young family
Another trip to see "Mr Fingers"
reviews.text: Given the Euro Exchange rate we were glad we went all inclusive bar prices in nearby Mogan were extortionate as some guests found out.
Sheets changed once during our 7 day stay, clean towels each day
reviews.title: Great Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel operates a no towels on sunloungers around the pool before 10:00am and they enforce the rule, good for them.
reviews.title: A great place for a quiet, relaxing week

reviews.text: This hotel is fantastic as soon as you walk in the foyer your stuned the hotel is very large, clean and full of things to do. the rooms are fantastic all with great views they are spacious clean and have baloconys, the tennis court is on the eighth floor i think so while you play you have a great view, the animation team are fantastic theres lots of activites each day shufflr board, archery, waterpool etc... the resturant has a wide selection, and the staff are fantastic!!!!!! would recommend to anyone
reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic!!!!! hoping to go back soon!

reviews.text: If anyone has any questions dont hesitate to ask!
reviews.title: Great holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked a week with Portland, to relax.
reviews.title: lovely time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were impressed when we arrived, the foyer was very spacious, and immaculate.
reviews.title: Winter Getaway

likes.disliked: — Not a great choice for vegetarians

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check in was easy, and reception staff spoke English, and were very helpful. We had booked 1 low floor room, and were given 2 adjacent rooms on the 2nd floor, which was fine.
reviews.title: Chilled out at the Taurito Princess

likes.liked: — View from balcony and friendliness of all of the staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Taurito Princess in the last week in November. The weather was really good, sunny, clear skies all week, late 70s degrees.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel for a chill out holiday

likes.liked: — Great service at hotel, lovley island with lots to do

reviews.text: We found the previous reviews of this hotel were generally spot on so there were no unexpected surprises in store. The common areas of the hotel are well presented, clean and tidy, all the staff were really nice and helpful. The room was fine with lots of storage but not suitable for honeymooners. Our ‘double’ bed was two fully made up singles pushed together and I fell down the gap on a couple of occasions! There was also a decent sized balcony with table of chairs on.
reviews.title: Fantastic Stay!

likes.liked: — The staff and the over-all stunning views.
likes.disliked: — That i didn't drink enough beer (haha!)

reviews.text: The fridge and the safe were available for hire at 18 euros each (6 euros returnable deposit). The bathroom was spacious, tidy and fully functioning. The air con system was ancient but was free and worked. Maid service was provided every day if you wanted this.
reviews.title: brilliant staff

likes.liked: — very good all inclusive good staff @ entertainment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Regarding the All-Inclusive, this was overall very good and compares well to other hotels we’ve been to. The food was not bad at all but a bit samey despite the various theme nights. We had no problems getting a seat at meal times in the one restaurant they have. They also have a snack bar during the day where you can get burgers, pizza and hot dogs.
reviews.title: horrible honeymoon

reviews.text: The alcoholic drinks were available from early until midnight and had a large selection available on the A-I, including sangria, cava and some cocktails, as well as beer, spirits and wines. Coffee, tea, juice, water and fizzy soft drinks are also available on the A-I. Unlike other places we’ve been to, they more than happy to allow you to take drinks back to the room.
reviews.title: Enjoyed our time at the Taurito Princess!

likes.disliked: — The temperature of the swimming pool

reviews.text: we just came back foom a great stay in this lovely hotel. The temperature was around 21 degees celsius (that's about 70 degrees fareinheit), which is of course great for february. The hotel was quiet, so we could really relax around the pool in almost silence. the pools were refreshing- one was cold, one was warm.There is a waterpark opposite the hotel costing around 7 euros for hotel guests( in feb 2009 thats about £6.50) The food was good in the restaurant, but i didn't eat any junk around the pool. the rooms were spacious. the staff were freindly. lots of activities(i.e. free tennis, freesquash,etc).overall a great hotel for thoseseeking a quiet week of relaxation away from the real world. However, if you want to get out and about to see some nightlife, this is not the place for you for everyone is tucked into bed by midnight.
reviews.title: great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is just fantastic. it is so clean and the staff are so friendly. The pool is absolutely brilliant and the barman at the pool bar is just a one off he is brilliant. The hotel isnt in the best location as there is nowhere to walk to or nowhere to stroll but you should know this before you go. This hotel definitely deserves 4 star. We will be back
reviews.title: Hotel Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at this hotel at the end of February. We found it to be extremely clean, very comfortable, plenty of sunbeds, staff were helpful and friendly. The area was quiet. There is a public lido near to the hotel and a crazy golf course but other than that the activity/entertainment is hotel based. The hotel runs a free bus service to/from Mogan and Puerto Rico where there is plenty to do. There was a great selection of food to suit all tastes. I would definitely recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Liked the peacefulness

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Returned 4th March 09 after 11 days at this hotel. This is a basically honest review of good and bad parts. Firstly, the good bits.......
reviews.title: All that glitters .......

reviews.text: GREAT : the food here is excellent and for mass catering, they do a fantastic job of providing variety and well cooked food. Cannot complain at all about the food. One of the best things about this hotel is that reserving sunbeds before 10 am is prohibited, and if folk put their towels on the beds and leave them before that time, the attendant comes and removes them!!!! You can imagine how this affects some people but for us, it was brilliant. It's revolutionary and should be made law in all hotels!!! The hotel is clean - well mostly, the loos in the reception were stinking of urine (most nights). The rooms are clean (if a little dated). And finally, there is a free bus every day to the next town. All good stuff.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel for a week of winter sunshine.
